channel.title: Structure of unit test on kodebot
channel.description: Recent content in Structure of unit test on kodebot

item.title: Structure
item.description: Any unit test will have two or more of the following steps Setup Run SUT Verification Cleanup Setup One of the first step in writing unit test is Setup. In this step, we prepare test data, dependencies and/or the context for the test. For example, we will replace any real dependencies with fake ones and define set of good test data as part of this step. However, this step is not necessary for all the tests.
